description:
In this course titled 'Eliminate Excuses And Take Responsibility with Self Hypnosis By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

1. It is highly witnessed that people who continuously groan and complain, hold others responsible for whatever happens in their life. They are the people who blame others for their failures and they always have an excuse for not achieving anything in their life.

  • This video course is designed to help you to eliminate excuses and take 100% responsibility for your life. Take control of your life by eliminating excuses and taking charge of your life. By taking charge of your life and eliminating unnecessary excuses, you are programming your mind for success and self-fulfillment. 2. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps change your limiting beliefs and thoughts 2) Self hypnosis brings more mental alertness 3) Self Hypnosis helps you a great wave of relaxation refreshing your whole body 4) Self hypnosis helps to connect with the deep sources of power and energy within you 5) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 6) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

This course is for those who love to give excuses and not get any work done on time and lack the sense of responsibility in their daily and professional life.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: Eliminate Excuses And Take Responsibility

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Eliminate Excuses And Take Responsibility with Self Hypnosis
